name: RAA Vision
description: RAA Vision — Emotional Intelligence Neuro-Layer for the Internet. Decode FOMO. Track Greed. Outsmart Emotion. RAA Vision is the first DataFi protocol that transforms emotional behavior into capital, combining AI, Big Data, and Web3 automation. We give traders and investors personal AI agents that protect capital by reading the market’s emotions in real time. The Problem Up to $1 trillion/year is lost to emotional trading. Only 12% of traders rely on data. Most follow fear, greed, or hype. The Solution RAA Vision decodes behavioral signals using AI-trained emotional scoring, real-time Big Data ingestion, and agent-powered execution. We tokenize market behavior — turning emotion into data, and data into decisions.
